pages.text: $(thing)Just Enough Items$(), also known as $(thing)JEI$(), is a mod which shows a list of every item in the game on the right side of the screen whenever your inventory is open or when you have a container open (such as a $(item)chest$(), $(item)workbench$(), or $(item)firepit$(), for example).

By $(thing)left-clicking$() or hovering over and pressing $(thing)$(k:key.jei.showRecipe)$() on an item in the list, you can lookup the recipes used to make it.$(2br)The tabs along the top show which $(thing)crafters$() can be used to create the item. It's worth checking each tab, as $(thing)JEI$() won't always show the best recipes first.$(2br)You can also lookup the recipe for items used in recipes in the same way.

If you want to know which recipes an item can be $(o)used$() in, $(thing)right-click$() or press $(thing)$(k:key.jei.showUses)$() on an item.$(2br)When looking up recipes, pressing $(thing)$(k:key.jei.recipeBack)$() will take you back to the previous step.
